basicInfo.name: Taka
basicInfo.flavor: After a private match with Teo, Taka enters the Night Crows with Karl Heron. However, he hasn't been given any missions other than to watch over the nest.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: When the target's current HP is 30% or lower, damage becomes equal to 55% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Wind Cutter
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack 1 time(s). [Additional 37% Crit Damage]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage to 46%.
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Dance of Death
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 260% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Hawk's Talons
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Nullification upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]
 - 3 Enemies (By Highest Attack Level)
 - Using any attack 2 time(s) has a 100% chance to inflict 2 stack(s) of Hawk's Talons. [Max 8 Stack(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Effect: [Hawk's Talons] increases Physical damage taken to 4%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Night Crows, grilled fish, Teo, Orly, Karl Heron, Janggi
profile.dislikes: Meat dumplings, Bai Jiao, Dellons, Kyle, repeating meaningless actions
profile.story: After a private match with Teo, Taka enters the Night Crows with Karl Heron. However, he hasn't been given any missions other than to watch over the nest.

basicInfo.name: Taka
basicInfo.flavor: During the War of Destruction, Taka gained fame as the mercenary that only sought the strongest opponents. After the war, he befriended Karl Heron, whom he wasn't able to settle a duel with, and they traveled together.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Wind Cutter
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack 1 time(s). [Additional 28% Crit Damage]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 28%.

Skill 2.name: Dance of Death
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 235% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Hawk's Talons
Passive.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest Attack Level)
 - Using any attack 2 time(s) has a 100% chance to inflict 2 stack(s) of Hawk's Talons. [Max 8 Stack(s)]

profile.story: During the War of Destruction, Taka gained fame as the mercenary that only sought the strongest opponents. After the war, he befriended Karl Heron, whom he wasn't able to settle a duel with, and they traveled together.

basicInfo.name: Taka
basicInfo.flavor: Taka was the adopted the son of the leader of the Anti-Teo Alliance, which Teo destroyed. He regards Teo and Orly as his real parents. His talent in swordsmanship was recognized, and he trained under Teo briefly before he went on to develop his own dual-sword style.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 35% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Wind Cutter
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack 1 time(s). [Additional 19% Crit Damage]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 19%.

Skill 2.name: Dance of Death
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 205% of Physical Attack when the target's current HP is 30% or lower.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Hawk's Talons
Passive.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest Attack Level)
 - Using any attack 2 time(s) has a 100% chance to inflict 2 stack(s) of Hawk's Talons. [Max 8 Stack(s)]
